backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, team management, access control, mailboxes, and media storage with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for domain and metadata updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides for the app theme.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry with domain redirect, canonical URL, and social metadata for beyhubx.com.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling hash-based routing, authentication state, profile setup modal, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name input, save handling, and validation.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfList.ts: Empty placeholder file replacing deprecated PDF list functionality.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfUploade: Empty placeholder file replacing deprecated PDF upload functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header that displays links, login button, and inbox badges based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Layout wrapper that constrains page width and optionally renders a title and description.
frontend/src/components/teams/JoinReques: Renders a join-team button with conditional states based on user authentication, membership, and team status.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamFootag: Displays a grid of team video footage with loading skeletons and a fallback message when empty.
Handles selecting, validating, and uploading video files with progress tracking for team footage.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamIconUp: Allows selecting, previewing, validating, and clearing team icon images with size/type checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user profile and role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for team management, inbox actions, and other backend interactions using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that mounts React, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTeamPage.tsx: Page for creating a new team, handling form input, optional icon upload, and navigation after creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, feature highlights, and navigation to teams or team creation.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Inbox page that displays mail, supports reading, deleting, and processing join requests for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderDashboardPage.t: Shows teams led by the signed‑in user, including pending join requests, with states for loading, unauthenticated, and empty teams.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Displays full team details, member info, icon and footage uploads, join actions, and leader-only disband controls with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/TeamListPage.tsx: Lists all teams with icons and member counts, including loading and empty states, and links to team detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Utility for converting image bytes to object URLs or base64 data URLs for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s visual style.
